author: Reuters
title: Netflix adds almost 16 million new customers amid lockdowns
description: Netflix Inc. on Tuesday reported more paid subscribers than expected in the first quarter, as global lockdowns to curb the spread of the novel coronavirus forced people to stay at home and watch shows online including the wildly popular Tiger King.
content:
